publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2054# Margaret Smith: RCN Scotland's "Value Nurses" Campaign—That the Parliament supports the Royal College of Nursing Scotland’s "Value Nurses" campaign, which highlights the crucial role that nurses play in delivering high quality patient care; welcomes the nursing summit announced by the Minister for Health and Community Care, and believes that the Executive should take action to recruit and retain more nurses and to reward them in a way which demonstrates the value the Parliament attaches to their work. Supported by: Tavish Scott*, Mr Mike Rumbles*, Ian Jenkins*
S1M-2054# RCN Scotland's "Value Nurses" Campaign (lodged on 27 June 2001) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-2054# RCN Scotland's "Value Nurses" Campaign (lodged on 27 June 2001) Irene McGugan*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2054# RCN Scotland's "Value Nurses" Campaign (lodged on 27 June 2001) Ms Sandra White*
S1M-2054# RCN Scotland's "Value Nurses" Campaign (lodged on 27 June 2001) Fergus Ewing*, Christine Grahame*
S1M-2054# RCN Scotland's "Value Nurses" Campaign (lodged on 27 June 2001) Robin Harper*

Supported by: Tavish Scott, Mr Mike Rumbles, Ian Jenkins, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Irene McGugan, Tommy Sheridan, Ms Sandra White, Fergus Ewing, Christine Grahame, Robin Harper
